messages.title: Our NHS is the finest in the world, we continue to improve it
messages.content: The Leaflet highlights the candidate's commitment to the NHS and mentions her visit to a local hospital and a testimonial from a consultant endorsing her.

messages.title: I will continue to campaign for safer streets and communities
messages.content: The candidate pledges to work with the Police and Crime Commissioner to tackle crime and antisocial behavior, citing her efforts to campaign for a safer local community.

messages.title: My campaign to bring business and investment into our city
messages.content: The leaflet describes the candidate's efforts to attract businesses and investments to the area, including her work with the City Council and the University.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The candidate supports the Conservative economic plan, which includes reducing the deficit, cutting income tax, and creating new jobs.
Promises include keeping the lowest paid out of tax, getting young people into work, and an ambitious goal of full employment.
Planning to raise the personal allowance and deliver tax-free minimum wage.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Strong Leadership. A Clear Economic Plan. A Better, More Secure Future.
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The overarching economic message of the Conservative Party led by David Cameron, advocating for strong leadership and clear economic policy.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Reference to the strategic importance of winning 23 more seats to deliver a majority Conservative government.

issues.economy: Support for the Conservative Party's plan for a stronger economy, reducing the deficit, and creating jobs.
issues.education: The candidate prioritizes improving standards in local schools and mentions supporting the Charter Academy.
issues.environment: The candidate has worked on campaigns for cleaner streets and safer cycling.
issues.health: The leaflet promotes the NHS and includes an endorsement by a consultant.
issues.socialWelfare: Education related to young people at universities and apprenticeships.

leaflet.personalStatement: The leaflet includes a personal endorsement from the candidate, saying 'I will work hard to... make sure that we all share in the success of a better economy.'

politicalExperience.achievements: Running successful campaigns for cleaner streets and safer cycling, and working with the City Council and University to bring investment into Portsmouth.

endorsements.endorser: Consultant Surgeon at Queen Alexandra Hospital
endorsements.endorsement: Praises the candidate's knowledge of the healthcare system.

endorsements.endorser: City of Portsmouth Girls' School headteacher
endorsements.endorsement: Support for the candidate's commitment to educational standards and local schools.

quotes.text: Flick's plan is for a better future for Portsmouth and Southsea.

images.caption: Flick Drummond with community members and local officials in various settings depicted on the leaflet.
